exclusion.criterion: Paraplegia or quadriplegia and legal blindness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any illness that in the opinion of the investigators would jeopardize the ability of the patient to tolerate aggressive chemotherapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of malignancy except localized basal cell, squamous skin cancer or carcinoma in situ of the cervix
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability or unwillingness to pursue effective means of birth control
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Failure to willingly accept or comprehend irreversible sterility as a side effect of therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Forced expiratory volume at one (FEV1) / forced vital capacity (FVC) < 60% of predicted after bronchodilator therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diffusing capacity of lung for carbon monoxide (DLCO) < 50% of predicted
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
